subject: Soccer
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer suspended Columbus Crew forward Emilio Renteria for one game for his head butt of Sporting Kansas City’s Paulo Nagamura on Saturday.
snippet: Major League Soccer suspended Columbus Crew forward Emilio Renteria for one game for his head butt of Sporting Kansas City’s Paulo Nagamura on Saturday.
